title: Seth Rogen responds after underage drinker is arrested for McLovin ID
text:
This is the face of a man who wanted to get arrested (Picture: Johnson County Sheriff”s Office/Columbia Pictures)

Seth Rogen responded with pride after an underage drinker was found in a bar last week with a copy of the McLovin ID.

The 20-year-old was arrested in Iowa – where the legal drinking age is 21 – with the Hawaii ID from Superbad that stated he was born on 3 June, 1981.

After spotting the headline, Seth retweeted the hilarious story and commented: ‘My work here is done.’

Considering Seth co-wrote, produced and acted in the comedy classic, we should just give the kid a free pass for his confidence.

Daniel Alfredo Burleson was arrested after an officer saw him with a drink in his hand.

Good to know the ID works.

The underage drinker refused to show his prop identification after admitting to police that his drink had vodka in it.

My work here is done. https://t.co/OxlR08Re8u — Seth Rogen (@Sethrogen) October 16, 2019

He knew exactly what he was doing (Picture: Johnson County Sheriff’s Office)

Police claimed he was taken outside of the bar and revealed his real ID, before officers noticed the McLovin prop.

In Daniel’s defence, his only other option was Muhammed.

Give this kid a get out of jail free card, stat.

The best part of this whole situation is how proud he is of his Amazon purchase in his mugshot.

Superbad was released in 2007, and starred all our favourite comedians Seth, Jonah Hill, Michael Cera, and McLovin himself Christopher Mintz-Plasse.

Fans were quick to add in their quips on the entire ordeal, with one user tweeting: ‘Damn you better pay this mans bail lmao’.

Seth was probably the arresting officer (Picture:Columbia/Son/REX/Shutterstock)

The McLovin prop was clearly used many times by many people.

One user tweeted: ‘My jokester, 44 year old husband used his McLovin ID to pick up his prescription at the pharmacy and the employee looked at it and handed it back without saying a word.’

According to Fox 11, authorities stated that Daniel ‘smelled strongly of ingested alcohol and had slurred speech and bloodyshot watery eyes’.

He was promptly arrested and charged with public intoxication, possession of a fake ID, possession of alcohol while underage and being in a bar after 10 pm while underage.

If it’s any consolation, Daniel, Seth is super proud of you.
